111.content:
Danny felt that nobody ever really listens to him, but that was about to change.

"From now on, everyone will do what I say with no questions." He said aloud, and a faint gold light surrounded him, only to disappear a moment later. He walked out of the room, and saw out the corner of his eye, his older sister, Brittany, Changing to go hang out with some friends.

"Hi Danny. Cant talk. I'm cutting it close." She said.

Danny saw this as a moment to test his new power. "How about you just stay home tonight instead?"

Brittany looked up for a moment, and paused as a little golden light flashed in her eyes. "Yeah, OK."

Danny knew that would never had actually worked before, so now it was time for something dumb an unnecessary. "And how about you wear your skirt as a shirt, and shirt as your skirt.”

"Why would I..." Brittany was cut off when the little gold light flashed in her eyes again. "Yeah, that's a great idea she said." She then piked up the pink skirt off the bed and paused. "Could you please look away?" She asked.

"Sure." Danny responded, turning around.

"You can look again." Brittany said a bit later. Danny turned around and grinned with satisfaction at the college girl wearing a mini skirt over her boobs, and a tank-top hanging from her waist. "Any more ideas?"

"Yeah, wear your heels back wards and use a hair band to put all your hair in front of your face." He was kidding, when he said that, but watched in awe has Brittany slid her high heels on backwards and then hid behind her hair. "You look great sis. Later."
Danny couldn’t believe his eyes. She had just dressed herself upside down and backwards, simply because he recommended it. Everyone was under his control now, no matter how stupid of an action he’d make them do. So what would he do now?
He did have a few options. His mom and sister were fashionable, it would very generous of one of them to simple donate their whole wardrobe to him. Speaking of his mom, she seemed to hold the power of the family before, but things were different now. Maybe he should be considered the mom, and while he’s at it, rework all the position’s of the current family. But then another thought came to him. He could control anyone, so why stay here? Head on out into the neighborhood, pick another house, build a new family, or even a potential playboy mansion.

You decide that since you now have these godlike abilities, you'd like to take on life from a different perspective. What better perspective than someone else's? You run a list through your head of who you could potentially become with your newfound talents.

The first person that comes to mind is the girl you've had a crush on since kindergarten. Harmony Smith, the blonde from across the street that never gave you the time of day. She was never a bully, and befriended many of the other girls your age. Undoubtedly the most popular girl at your school, always throwing parties you never recall being invited to. Perhaps these powers are going to your head? Or are you just going mad? Either way, the thought of turning the tables excites you.

However, there are still many more people in your neighborhood. People you know from school, people that are friends with your parents, people that despise you, bullies, the list goes on.

Whatsay you, all knowing reader. What direction will you take this story? Will you decide to take over Harmony's life or will your dastardly plans befall on another unknowing victim? You decide.
